references: J. Roberts, Lure of the Integers, Math. Assoc. America, 1992, p. 15.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Nick Hobson, Python program for this sequence
maple: rev:=proc(n) local nn, nnn: nn:=convert(n,base,10): add(nn[nops(nn)+1-j]*10^(j-1),j=1..nops(nn)) end: a[0]:=0: for n from 1 to 70 do a[n]:=rev(7+a[n-1]) od: seq(a[n],n=0..70); - _Emeric Deutsch_, Jul 28 2006
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
